name: Soundecol
tagline: R package with functions for soundscape ecology and other research in ecology that uses audio recordings.
body:
### soundecol
R package with functions for soundscape ecology and other research in ecology that uses audio recordings.

### Indices
* Acoustic Diversity Index ()
* Acoustic Complexity Index ()

### Authors and Contributors
Luis J. Villanueva (@ljvillanueva)

### Support or Contact
Feel free to contribute code, corrections, or ideas. For problems and bugs, please fill a report at https://github.com/ljvillanueva/soundecol/issues
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
